content.rendered:
Suyash Manjul is an experienced Litigator and has handled big ticket litigations and counseled clients in matters pertaining to corporate insolvency, breach of contract, infringement of IPR, real-estate disputes etc. Suyash has also handled several high stake arbitration matters as well as advised clients at the pre-arbitration stage.

With eight years of Litigation & Arbitration experience at District Courts, High Courts, Suyash looks after the Arbitration practice at Risis Legal. Suyash also specializes in watching movies and is an armchair Philosopher.

He is an alumnus of the National Law University, Lucknow and is presently enrolled with the Uttar Pradesh Bar Council.
